name: template-engine-ts
description: TypeScript-based replacement for the Fickle/Tcl template engine.

scripts.build:parser: npx peggy --format es -o lib/parser.js --dts --extra-options-file peggy.config.json src/grammar.peggy
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p lib && npm run build:parser && npm run build:ts
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build:parser && npm run build:cli
